  • Method Details

    • handleUserCreated

      public void handleUserCreated​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode userEventData) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Description copied from interface: IUserCommandService
      Handels a "user_created" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserCreatedEventDto and transformed in a User entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Specified by:
      handleUserCreated in interface IUserCommandService
      Parameters:
      userEventData - the event user data
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the userData cannot be converted to a UserCreatedEventDto.

      Handels a "user_deleted" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserDeletedEventDto. Then the user is deleted using the UserDeletedEventDto.

    • handleUserSpecializationAdded

      public java.lang.Boolean handleUserSpecializationAdded​(java.util.UUID userId, java.lang.Long specializationId)
      Description copied from interface: IUserCommandService
      Creates an user specialization mapping.

      If the user specialization mapping is created successfully then an outbox entry is created with the event type user_specialization_mapping_created.

      Specified by:
      handleUserSpecializationAdded in interface IUserCommandService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      specializationId - the specialization id
      Returns:
      True, if the user specialization mapping was created successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • handleUserSpecializationUpdated

      public java.lang.Boolean handleUserSpecializationUpdated​(java.util.UUID userId, java.lang.Long specializationId, java.lang.Boolean isValid)
      Description copied from interface: IUserCommandService
      Validates or challenges an existing user specialization mapping.

      If the user specialization mapping is validated successfully then an outbox entry is created with the event type user_specialization_mapping_verified.
      If the user specialization mapping is challenged successfully then an outbox entry is created with the event type user_specialization_mapping_challenged.

      Specified by:
      handleUserSpecializationUpdated in interface IUserCommandService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      specializationId - the specialization id
      isValid - the flag indication if the mapping is valid
      Returns:
      True, if the user specialization mapping was updated successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • handleUserSpecializationRemoved

      public java.lang.Boolean handleUserSpecializationRemoved​(java.util.UUID userId, java.lang.Long specializationId)
      Description copied from interface: IUserCommandService
      Deletes an existing user specialization mapping.

      If the user specialization mapping is deleted successfully then an outbox entry is created with the event type user_specialization_mapping_deleted.

      Specified by:
      handleUserSpecializationRemoved in interface IUserCommandService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      specializationId - the specialization id
      Returns:
      True, if the user specialization mapping was deleted successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • handleOutboxEvent

      private void handleOutboxEvent​(OutboxEntity entity)
      Inserts and deletes an outbox entity in the database. The outbox entity is inserted to trigger the creation of an event by the database monitoring service.
      Since the data monitoring service uses the write ahead log to parse the entries, the outbox entries can be deleted after insertion to free the used space.
      Parameters:
      entity - the outbox entity
